title: Resbook User
description: A booking system for users to make and manage reservations.
longDescription: Resbook is a comprehensive booking system that enables users to easily make, view, and manage their reservations. The platform offers an intuitive interface for scheduling, real-time availability updates, and automated confirmation emails.

title: FS Holstebro
description: A website created for a local football club in Holstebro.
longDescription: This website serves as the digital home for FS Holstebro football club, providing match schedules, team information, news updates, and community engagement features. The site was designed to enhance communication between the club and its supporters while showcasing the club's history and achievements.

title: Bookspace
description: A webapp created, where users can read and write reviews about books.
longDescription: Bookspace is a community-driven platform where book enthusiasts can share their thoughts and reviews on various books. Users can create accounts, write reviews, and engage with other readers. The platform aims to foster a love for reading and provide a space for discussions about literature.
